name: Reverse Snake (Lushy)
description:
Snake but instead of eating and becoming longer, your parts will detach and become your obstacles.

Controls: WASD

In Classic mode, you need only to get to 1 length

In Infinite mode, you can play as long as you can survive

It's a mini-game I've made years ago and right now as I'm getting back into Unity I will post more of them, soo if you enjoyed it or not please leave feedback ;)
